dcterms:creator: X. Wang
Z. Fei
Z. Zheng
J. Guo
dcterms:description: This dataset is used for joint waveform design and passive beamforming in a RIS-assisted dual-functional radar-communication system, focusing on maximizing radar output signal-to-interference-plus-noise ratio (SINR).
dcterms:title: RIS-assisted DFRC system

dcterms:creator: R. Liu
M. Li
A. L. Swindlehurst
dcterms:description: This dataset involves joint beamforming and reflection design for RIS-assisted integrated sensing and communication (ISAC) systems, focusing on optimizing communication and sensing functionalities.
dcterms:title: RIS-assisted ISAC systems

dcterms:creator: J. R. Guerci
dcterms:description: This dataset provides insights into cognitive radar systems, focusing on knowledge-aided fully adaptive approaches for radar signal processing.
dcterms:title: Cognitive radar

dcterms:creator: A. Aubry
A. De Maio
A. Farina
M. Wicks
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on knowledge-aided transmit signal and receive filter design in signal-dependent clutter, providing methodologies for improving radar performance.
dcterms:title: Knowledge-aided transmit signal and receive filter design

dcterms:creator: J. R. Guerci
dcterms:description: This dataset covers the Space-Time Adaptive Processing (STAP) technique for radar, providing methodologies for adaptive clutter suppression and target detection.
dcterms:title: STAP technique

dcterms:creator: Y. Sun
P. Babu
D. P. Palomar
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses majorization-minimization algorithms applicable in signal processing, communications, and machine learning, providing frameworks for optimization.
dcterms:title: ADMM and MM methods

dcterms:creator: X. Yu
D. Xu
R. Schober
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on MISO wireless communication systems utilizing intelligent reflecting surfaces, providing methodologies for optimizing communication performance.
dcterms:title: Riemannian optimization
